TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k ɔ l ə s t ɪ l ə æ s k h ɜː t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ə ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɜː f ʊ t n w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ ɹ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k ɐ s l æ b ʌ v ð ə b l uː tʃ i z æ n d m eɪ b i ð ə n eɪ ɪ s n eɪ k ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː ð ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k ɐ s n æ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ b t ə t oɪ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ t s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ ð ə θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n ɪ s t eɪ ʃ ə n z
